title: FS: 1888 H. D. Smith (Scrapps) - most of set

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 H. D. Smith (Scrapps) - most of set
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

UPDATE : 
ALL SOLD - 


If you'd like more info about the set, this nifty writeup describes the detective work Al Crisafulli at LOTG Auctions did to identify the set more precisely than it had been before.
[url]https://lotgauctions.blog/2014/10/08/the-origin-of-scrapps-tobacco/[/url]


Thanks for looking-
Tim
